body_html:
@alextp : Ok, I checked to move automatic attribute inference at the core level but finally decided to left it in the C API because:
1- This feature purpose is to establish a contract between the core and its clients, which is also the purpose of the C API. The core should be free to do it the way that suits it better.
2- We won't accidentally break our clients if this "hidden" feature is removed in the core later
3- ...it was simpler ;)
